content: this eyeball coaster crochet pattern is available for free online on my blog here https //hookedonpatterns com/crochet-blog/free-halloween-eyeball-coasters-crochet-pattern the eyeball coasters pdf pattern is available to download for a small price it includes extra high quality photographs and you ll also receive an image-free printer friendly copy crochet some spooky halloween eyeball coasters with this easy crochet pattern any aran/worsted weight yarn would work for this project although cotton is recommended for its absorbency and heat resistance i have used a mix of aran/worsted weight 100% cotton yarn i had in my stash drops paris paintbox yarns cotton rico creative cotton and a 4 5mm crochet hook the finished eyeball coasters measure approximately 10cm/4 in diameter these coasters are quick to make and only use a small amount of yarn less than 10yds of each colour so they are great for craft fairs or classroom gifting gauge exact gauge is not too important just try to keep your stitches compact i have used a 4 5mm hook with aran/worsted weight yarn which is half a hook size smaller than recommended for the yarn you will need aran/worsted weight cotton yarn in the following colours for each coaster black - less than 2yds iris main colour - less than 5yds iris accent colour - less than 3yds white - less than 9yds pink or red - less than 5yds 4 5mm hook stitch marker yarn needle scissors optional a steam iron for blocking
